Dear all Asking for advice regarding SIA Krisflyer - redemption booking.I waitlisted on a flight (particular time and destination) by redeeming krisflier points. but my today's search on SIA the same journey  the redemption waiting list option is even gone. flight is scheduled on 17th March2024. does this mean i better just buy commercial booking now  to avoid it might sell out?any advise?economy flight to Narita on 17th March 24
i don't like to see 0.00.. so leave $10 loh..can be $1 can be $8.88... individual preference I guess...

Am curious. Many people here very interested in the UOB Rising Dragon Savings Promotion. And I did a brief calculation for a placement range of 20K to 200K  the p/a interest rate is 1.3+% to 1.9+%. Can I understand briefly what the hype is about ?
Because you are still earning normal up to 5% p.a. on the UOB account. This promotion is on top of that

I see thanks. So is 5% and on top of that  there is an approx 1.3+% to 1.5+%. But that additional interest rate is due to the top up of funds right which u can’t withdraw for 4 mths. I mean can just place the additional funds in FD instead? Am thinking I might have missed out on something. Since it’s locked in for 4 mths  and is additional funds top up  it works like an FD and the interest rate is 1.3%+ to 1.9+% .. ?

yes you missed out on what is just being discussed above.EMPTY the account before the reference date.So when participating  your account will only have $100k which earns the full 5% p.a. + lock up promo of 1.5% p.a. = 6.5% p.a.
Am confused. Will try digesting abit. Thanks 🙏
Cos I think you are using 200k as your reference. The 6.5ish pa is using 100k.
If they are taking reference from 31st March which is a Sunday I think we should remove funds on 28th March considering 29th March is a PH and 30th and 31st March is a weekend
